# Number of lines of code in choose: 9
sub choose {
    my $self = shift;
    my @input = @_;


    $self->getRandoms(scalar(@{ $self->{questions} }), @input);
    $self->selectQA();
    $self->dumpExtra();
}

public method Select::selectQA (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in selectQA: 7
sub selectQA {
    my $self = shift;

    $self->{selected_q} = [ @{ $self->{questions} }[ @{ $self->{slice} } ] ];
    $self->{selected_a} = [ @{ $self->{answers} }[@{ $self->{slice} } ] ];
    $self->{inverted_shuffle} = [ &ChoiceList::invert(@{ $self->{shuffle} }) ];
}
